Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Unit gains [abilityblue]Detection[/abilityblue], +{VisionRange} Strategic Vision Range and a {bonus}% bonus to critical hit chance.
单位获得[abilityblue]侦察[/abilityblue]，策略视野范围 +{VisionRange}，暴击率增加 {bonus}%。

This unit gains [abilityblue]Regeneration[/abilityblue], healing {ReassemblyHealOverTime}[hp/] each turn in combat, and recovers all of its [hp/] at the start of its owner's turn on the strategic map.[br/]If the unit dies, the reassembly module attempts to repair all vital systems, allowing the unit to reassemble itself after the battle if the unit's owner wins.
该单位获得[abilityblue]再生[/abilityblue]，在战斗中每回合治疗 {ReassemblyHealOverTime}[hp/]，并且当该单位所有者在策略地图上的回合开始时，恢复全部[hp/]。[br/]若该单位死亡，改造模块会尝试修复所有重要系统。如果该单位所有者获得战斗胜利，则该单位将进行自我改造。

Advanced technologies grant this unit [abilityblue]Universal Camouflage[/abilityblue]on the World Map and the [abilityblue]Evasion[/abilityblue] defense mode. In addition, the unit becomes {ChameleonicOverwatchAccuracyDecrease} harder to hit with all attacks.
高级技术使该单位在世界地图上获得[abilityblue]通用伪装[/abilityblue]和[abilityblue]闪避[/abilityblue]防御模式。此外，所有攻击命中该单位的难度增加 {ChameleonicOverwatchAccuracyDecrease}。
A wild swing of the hammer that can damage all targets in front of the unit.
大力挥锤，可对单位前方所有目标造成伤害。
Create a Construct under the player's control on the target hex.[br/][br/]The summoned unit will inherit any compatible mods that do not grant an active ability.[br/]
在目标单元格创造一个由玩家控制的半机械蜘蛛。[br/][br/]召唤单位将会继承所有不会赋予主动技能的兼容模块。[br/]
Create an Advanced Construct under the player's control on the target hex.[br/][br/]The summoned unit will inherit any compatible mods that do not grant an active ability.[br/]
在目标单元格创造一个由玩家控制的高级半机械蜘蛛。[br/][br/]召唤单位将会继承所有不会赋予主动技能的兼容模块。[br/]

Target a dead light Cyborg or Mechanical ground unit to bring it back to life with {ResurrectHealth} of its max [hp/]. Target a living Cyborg or Machanical unit to heal it for {ReassembleHealAmount}. Cannot target self.[br/]Puts the unit into Defense Mode after use.[br/][br/]
以阵亡的轻型半机械人或机械陆地单位为目标时，可复活目标单位并恢复其 {ResurrectHealth} 的最大[hp/]。以存活的半机械人或机械单位为目标时，可治疗 {ReassembleHealAmount}。无法以自身为目标。[br/]使用此技能后，单位将进入防御模式。[br/][br/]

Target a dead Cyborg or Mechanical ground unit to bring it back to life with {ResurrectHealth} of its max [hp/]. Target a living Cyborg or Mechanical unit to heal it for {ReassembleHealAmount}. Cannot target self.[br/]Puts the unit into Defense Mode after use.[br/][br/]
以阵亡的半机械人或机械陆地单位为目标时，可复活目标单位并恢复其 {ResurrectHealth} 的最大[hp/]。以存活的半机械人或机械单位为目标时，可治疗 {ReassembleHealAmount}。无法以自身为目标。[br/]使用此技能后，单位将进入防御模式。[br/][br/]
Upgrades the Reverse Engineer. It is now possible to Reassemble Heavy units as well as Light units, and to create more powerful Advanced Constructs.
升级逆转工程。现在轻型和重型单位都可以进行“重装”，同时还能建造更强大的高级半机械蜘蛛。
This unit repairs itself with parts from its foes. Successfully melee attacking non-Mineral and non-Ethereal units heals this unit for {AssimilateLifeSteal} per hit.
该单位可以用敌人的部件修复自己。每次对非矿物单位和非虚灵单位造成近战攻击成功时，可治疗该单位 {AssimilateLifeSteal}。
Heals for {AssimilateLifeSteal} when attacking non-Mineral, non-Ethereal units.
攻击非矿物单位或非虚灵单位时将治疗 {AssimilateLifeSteal}。
Destroy the target corpse and heal the unit for {healAmount}.[br/]Puts the unit into defense mode after use.[br/][br/]
摧毁目标尸体并治疗单位 {healAmount}。[br/]使用此技能后，单位将进入防御模式。[br/][br/]
The Inspector is able to make small maintenance repairs on friendly Cyborg and Mechanical units, healing them for {hp}.
巡查者为友方半机械人单位和机械单位进行小型维护修复，能够为其治疗 {hp}。
When destroyed, the Wrecker will return after {ReassemblyTurns} in a weakened state.[br/][br/][firecol]A unit can only revive itself once per battle.[/firecol]
如果破坏者被摧毁，将在 {ReassemblyTurns} 后以虚弱状态复活。[br/][br/][firecol]每个单位在每场战斗中只能复活自己一次。[/firecol]
This unit is weakened from reassembly - it does less damage and has less armor.
该单位因进行了重装而处于虚弱状态，造成伤害降低且护甲减少。

Melee attacks against Biological and Cyborg units heal the user for {healAmount}, and have a {FleshTearerChance}[strengthphysical/] strength chance ({FleshTearerChanceRepeating}[strengthphysical/] for repeating attacks) to apply [abilityred]Bleeding[/abilityred], doing damage over time and reducing [DamagePhysical/] resistance for {BleedDuration}[turn/].

对生物和半机械人单位发动的近战攻击可治疗使用者 {healAmount}，并有 {FleshTearerChance}[strengthphysical/] 力量几率（重复攻击有 {FleshTearerChanceRepeating}[strengthphysical/] 几率）施加[abilityred]流血[/abilityred]，造成持续伤害并减少 [DamagePhysical/] 抵抗，持续 {BleedDuration}[turn/]。

This unit's melee attacks now do Biochemical damage and have a {NeuroChance}[StrengthBio/] strength chance ({NeuroChanceRepeating}[strengthBio/] for repeating attacks) to apply [abilityred]Neural Toxin[/abilityred] to Biological and Cyborg units, which can damage or stun the target, for {Duration}[turn/].
该单位的近战攻击将造成生化伤害，并有 {NeuroChance}[StrengthBio/] 力量几率（重复攻击有 {NeuroChanceRepeating}[strengthBio/] 几率）对生物单位和半机械人单位施加[abilityred]神经毒素[/abilityred]，可对目标造成伤害或使其眩晕，持续 {Duration}[turn/]。

Extensive implants fitted with specialized field generators automatically target all friendly units within a {SupportAoERadius} hex radius of this unit. This unit and all other affected units gain +{SupportNaniteShields}[shield/] and heal for {SupportHealAmount}[hp/] each turn for {SupportTurns}.
配有立场发生器的大规模植入物，自动以该单位 {SupportAoERadius} 个单元格范围内的所有友方单位为目标。该单位和其他所有受影响的单位获得 +{SupportNaniteShields}[shield/]，同时每回合治疗 {SupportHealAmount}[hp/]，持续 {SupportTurns}。
This unit is being protected by Quantum Support Nanites, providing {SupportNaniteShields} and healing it for {SupportHealAmount}[hp/] each turn.
该单位正受到量子辅助纳米机器人的保护，获得 {SupportNaniteShields} 且每回合会治疗 {SupportHealAmount}[hp/]。

This unit is immune to all damage over time status effects. Whenever the unit takes damage that would kill it, the unit is left at 1 [HP/] instead, and it gains complete immunity to all damage, stagger and status effects for 1[turn/].[br/]Only triggers once per battle.
该单位免疫所有持续性状态效果伤害。该单位受到致命伤害时不会死亡但[HP/]会变为 1，同时免疫所有伤害和状态效果，持续 1[turn/]。[br/]每次战斗只能触发一次。
Reform the swarm into a Reaver.
从群体形态改变成掠夺者形态。
Split the Reaver into a Swarm of devouring robots, restoring {healAmount}.
将掠夺者分裂成一群毁灭性极强的机器人，同时恢复 {healAmount}。

Restore all Action Points [movewalk/] and dispel all hostile status effects on target friendly unit. This effect can jump up to {ReEnergizeJumps} additional targets within {ReEnergizeHexes} hexes of the original unit. This ability does not work on the Assembly Reaver, regardless of what form they are in.
恢复目标友方单位全部操作点数[movewalk/]并驱散所有负面状态效果。该效果最多可弹跳至初始单位 {ReEnergizeHexes} 个单元格内额外 {ReEnergizeJumps} 个单位。该技能对半机械人掠夺者无效，无论其处于何种形态。

The Reaver swarms around the target, attempting to devour it and add the target's parts to its own form. If a unit is killed by this attack, the Reaver gains a buff until end of combat, depending on the type of unit killed.
掠夺者围绕目标，试图将目标吞没并将其部件添加到自己的形态中。如果某个单位因此被击杀，掠夺者将根据被击杀单位的种类获得一项增益，持续到战斗结束。
This unit heals {BiologicalHeal}[hp/] per stack of this buff. Lasts until end of combat.
每层该增益将治疗该单位 {BiologicalHeal}[hp/]，持续到战斗结束。
This unit deals {CyborgDamage} extra damage per stack of this buff. Lasts until end of combat.
每层该增益将为该单位提供额外 {CyborgDamage} 伤害，持续到战斗结束。
This unit has {MechanicalCritChance} extra critical hit chance per stack of this buff. Lasts until end of combat.
每层该增益将为该单位提供额外 {MechanicalCritChance} 暴击率，持续到战斗结束。
This unit gains +{MineralArmor} per stack of this buff. Lasts until end of combat.
每层该增益将为该单位提供 +{MineralArmor}，持续到战斗结束。
This unit is {EtherealHitChance} harder to hit per stack of this buff. Lasts until end of combat.
每层该增益将使该单位的命中难度增加 {EtherealHitChance}，持续到战斗结束。
Build a Water Construct on an adjacent hex
在相邻单元格建造一只水生半械蜘蛛

The Constrictor locks itself and the target together in a phased field, granting both of them +{shieldBuff}[shield/] and stagger resistance, disabling their abilities and holding them in place. The effect lasts until the target breaks free, or the Constrictor is killed or staggered.
收束者将自身和目标锁定在一个相位力场中，使技能无效并使两者固定在一个地方且都会获得 +{shieldBuff}[shield/]和动摇抵抗。如果目标挣脱或是收束者被击杀或被动摇，效果将会消失。
This unit is enveloped in an energy field granting it +{shieldBonus}[shield/] and stagger resistance. It can choose to crush its foe or release it, but is otherwise unable to act.
该单位被某种能量力场环绕，获得 +{shieldBonus}[shield/]和动摇抵抗。该单位可以碾碎或释放敌人，但无法进行其他行动。
This unit is enveloped in an energy field granting it +{shieldBonus}[shield/] and stagger resistance, but preventing it from acting.
该单位被某种能量力场环绕，获得 +{shieldBonus}[shield/]和动摇抵抗，但也无法行动。
Release the constrictor and its captive from the Constriction Field
释放收束力场中的收束者和被禁锢的目标。
Crush the target with a static-charged appendage, dealing heavy damage.
使用充满静电的附肢碾碎目标，造成大量伤害。
This unit restores an additional {ProcurerRegen}[HP/] to all Cyborg and Mechanical units in its army after each battle.
每次战斗结束后，该单位为所有半机械人单位和机械单位额外恢复 {ProcurerRegen}[HP/]。
A blast of energy targeted at a unit. [abilityred]Knocks back[/abilityred] Light units.
一股能量冲击波，可[abilityred]击退[/abilityred]轻型单位。

The swarm descends on the target, pulling it to pieces to make a new form. {RecombinationChance}[StrengthPhysical/] strength chance to transform the target unit into a Construct under the player's control. If this fails, the target instead takes {RecombinationDamage}[DamagePhysical/].
机器人群向目标发动袭击，将其撕成碎片并组成新的形态。有 {RecombinationChance}[StrengthPhysical/]的力量几率将目标转变成由玩家控制的半机械蜘蛛。如果转变失败，则目标受到 {RecombinationDamage}[DamagePhysical/]。
A device for the rapid collection, processing and reuse of dead bodies on the battlefield.
一种能够在战场上快速收集、处理并重复利用尸体的设备。
Heals for {AssimilateLifeSteal} when attacking Biological or Cyborg units
攻击生物或半机械人单位时，治疗 {AssimilateLifeSteal}。

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
